Subject: Hot Rod DrillBit Dimolition
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::Hot Rod::

He opened plasma charge, and optic lazer fire on the invaders.
"To attack the Alliance, is to invite certain DEATH!"

::DrillBit::

He ran out, after StarScream.
"Wait up! Beast mode." He transformed, to beast mode, and drilled after
him.

::Dimolition::

He tranformed to jet mode, and took off after the War Machines.

OOC: Dimolition looks like the old Decepticons jets. His colors are
black, and silver.
